summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the UNetRL model’s initialization, forward computation, output dimensions, deterministic behavior, exponential moving average training, and its ability to be saved, loaded, and used from pretrained sources, as well as confirming training loop correctness.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and reproducibility of the UNetRL architecture for production reinforcement‑learning applications by automatically checking model integrity, persistence, and training performance.
